page.title: 10BUS ROUTES, BURSTON AREA
page.content:
The whole of the area is served by a very limited form of Public Transport. Although the village is situated on a main road,there is only a service into Stafford for workers each morning and returning in the evening.The last bus leaves at 5.00pm. There is a daytime service on two days each week for shoppers.
There is no official service on any of the other roads,but members of the public are allowed to use the school children's transport on a Friday morning.This means that when the schools are on holiday the outlying districts are completely cut off and have to rely on neighbours who have their own transport.
